revised_title: Further Determinations of Direct Osmotic Pressures and Their Applications
tldr: This article presents further determinations of direct osmotic pressures and their applications. The authors conducted experiments on various solutions, including cane sugar and mineral water crystals, to study osmotic pressure and its relationship with solution dynamics. They also developed a new method for determining osmotic pressures and molecular weights of substances. The findings contribute to a better understanding of osmotic pressure and its role in solution chemistry.
